Select Contents To Copy Dialog Box

Requires: Base Development System

Select Select contents to copy from the Save As dialog box to display this dialog box.

This dialog box includes two pages, the Items page and the Files page. The Items page displays the project items as they exist in the project tree. The Files page displays the project items that have a corresponding file on disk.

Use this dialog box to select or deselect the project contents you want to copy. All project contents are selected by default.

  • Project Items—Displays all contents associated with the LabVIEW project you want to copy. The tree displays all files and directories that the LabVIEW project owns. Click an item in the tree to select it.
